trans-unit.source: # PolyChemPrint3 Free and Open Source 3D Printer control software targeted at Research Users (Polymer/Paste/BioPrinting) Written in/for Python 3.3+ (but may work on others)
trans-unit.target: # PolyChemPrint3 Free and Open Source 3D Printer control software targeted at Research Users (Polymer/Paste/BioPrinting) Written in/for Python 3.3+ (but may work on others)

trans-unit.source: FOSS additive manufacturing control software targeted at research Users (Polymer/Paste/BioPrinting)
trans-unit.target: Software de control de fabricación de aditivos de FOSS dirigido a los usuarios de investigación (Polímero/Pasta/Bioimpresión)

trans-unit.source: Please cite the following papers if you make use of this software in your research! > [Paper Submitted] >
trans-unit.target: Please cite the following papers if you make use of this software in your research! > [Paper Submitted] >

trans-unit.source: The software is written to be convenient for researchers with features like automatic data logging, parameterized shapes, and convenient macros.
trans-unit.target: El software está escrito para ser conveniente para los investigadores con características como el registro automático de datos,formas parametrizadas y macros convenientes.

trans-unit.source: This software was initially written by Bijal Patel from 2017-2019 as an object-oriented cross-platform tool and successor to PolyPrint, a Perl script.
trans-unit.target: Este software fue escrito inicialmente por Bijal Patel de 2017 a 2019 como una herramienta multiplataforma orientada a los objetos y sucesora de PolyPrint,una escritura en Perl.

trans-unit.source: Within our lab (Diao Group at the University of Illinois http://diao.scs.illinois.edu/Diao_Lab/Home.html) we have succesfully used it to print solutions for organic semiconductors/conductors, polymer photonics, hydrogels, chocolate, etc.
trans-unit.target: Within our lab (Diao Group at the University of Illinois http://diao.scs.illinois.edu/Diao_Lab/Home.html) we have succesfully used it to print solutions for organic semiconductors/conductors, polymer photonics, hydrogels, chocolate, etc.
